languages.text: Столичный мир Даргонус — дом высшей аристократии протектората фон Валанциус. Власть каждой из дворянских семей превосходит власть колониального губернатора, и обеспечение полной лояльности аристократии является важным шагом по утверждению нового Вольного Торговца в своем статусе.

traits.locale_text: Столичный мир Даргонус — дом высшей аристократии торговой империи фон Валанциус. Власть каждой из дворянских семей превосходит власть колониального губернатора, и обеспечение полной лояльности аристократии является важным шагом по утверждению нового Вольного Торговца в своем статусе.

languages.text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Столичный мир Даргонус — дом высшей аристократии протектората фон Валанциус. Власть каждой из дворянских семей превосходит власть колониального губернатора, и обеспечение полной лояльности аристократии является важным шагом по утверждению нового Вольного Торговца в своем статусе.

traits.locale_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius trade empire. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimizing the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius trade empire. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimizing the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius trade empire. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimizing the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 达戈努斯是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首都世界，也是所有高阶贵族的故乡。无论是哪个贵族家族，都拥有着比殖民地总督更大的权力。只有确保这些贵族完全忠于你，他们才会承认新任行商浪人的合法权威，这一步至关重要。
languages.original_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首都世界，也是所有高阶贵族的故乡。无论是哪个贵族家族，都拥有着比殖民地总督更大的权力。只有确保这些贵族完全忠于你，他们才会承认新任行商浪人的合法权威，这一步至关重要。

languages.text: ダルゴナスの首都惑星には、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の上級貴族が住んでいる。どの貴族も植民地総督以上の権力を持っているため、貴族の完全な忠誠を確保することは、新しい自由開拓者の権威を正式なものとする上で重要なステップだ。
languages.original_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスの首都惑星には、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の上級貴族が住んでいる。どの貴族も植民地総督以上の権力を持っているため、貴族の完全な忠誠を確保することは、新しい自由開拓者の権威を正式なものとする上で重要なステップだ。

languages.text: El mundo capital Dargonus es el hogar de la alta aristocracia del protectorado von Valancius. El poder de cualquiera de las familias nobles es superior al del gobernador colonial, de modo que asegurar la lealtad de la nobleza es un paso importante para legitimar la autoridad de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: El mundo capital Dargonus es el hogar de la alta aristocracia del protectorado von Valancius. El poder de cualquiera de las familias nobles es superior al del gobernador colonial, de modo que asegurar la lealtad de la nobleza es un paso importante para legitimar la autoridad de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Die Hauptwelt Dargonus ist die Heimat des Hochadels des Protektorats derer von Valancius. Da jede einzelne Adelsfamilien über mehr Macht verfügt als der Koloniegouverneur, ist die Sicherung der absoluten Loyalität des Adels ein wichtiger Schritt zur Festigung der Autorität {mf|des neuen Freihändlers|der neuen Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Die Hauptwelt Dargonus ist die Heimat des Hochadels des Protektorats derer von Valancius. Da jede einzelne Adelsfamilien über mehr Macht verfügt als der Koloniegouverneur, ist die Sicherung der absoluten Loyalität des Adels ein wichtiger Schritt zur Festigung der Autorität {mf|des neuen Freihändlers|der neuen Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Le monde-capitale de Dargonus abrite la haute aristocratie du protectorat von Valancius. La puissance de n'importe laquelle des familles nobles dépasse celle du gouverneur colonial et s'assurer la loyauté de la noblesse est une étape importante dans le processus de légitimation {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Le monde capitale de Dargonus abrite la haute aristocratie du protectorat von Valancius. La puissance de n'importe laquelle des familles nobles dépasse celle du gouverneur colonial et s'assurer la loyauté de la noblesse est une étape importante dans le processus de légitimation {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Başdünya Dargonus, von Valancius protektorasının yüksek aristokrasinin yuvasıdır. Bu soylu ailelerin herhangi birinin gücü, koloni valilerininkinden daha fazladır. Soyluların tamamen sadık olmalarını sağlamak, yeni Hür Tacir'in otoritesine meşruiyet kazandırmakta önemli bir adımdır.
languages.original_text: The capital world of Dargonus is home to the high aristocracy of the von Valancius protectorate. The power of any one of the noble families exceeds that of the colonial governor, and securing the complete loyalty of the nobility is an important step to legitimising the authority of the new Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Başdünya Dargonus, von Valancius protektorasının yüksek aristokrasinin yuvasıdır. Bu soylu ailelerin herhangi birinin gücü, koloni valilerininkinin üzerindedir ve soyluların tamamen sadık olmalarını sağlamak, yeni Hür Tacir'in otoritesine meşruluk kazandırmak için önemli bir adımdır.
